attributes.action: Allow the planting of Filbert Hazelnuts at the King Power Stadium, Leicester.
attributes.additional_details: I’m just an average person.  Would be Milkman who know commits themselves to health, sport, keep fit, science and the arts.  I was born and raised in the Midlands.  I support a variety of individual sportsmen and women in individual and team sports whether they be amateur enthusiasts or professionals.  The petition is aimed at anyone who is simply nutty about all things Leicester but in a nice way of course!
attributes.background: What some people may not be fully aware of is there is such a thing as a Filbert tree, yet, despite being called Filbert Way there are actually NO Filbert Hazelnuts Trees on the Way which is like a U shape around the ground off Raw Dykes Road, Bede Island, Leicester.  We need our nuts!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://www.cabinet.leicester.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
